acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Reason for Adjournment: Adjournment request by Prosecutor/ Compl. Adv.

business_details.Business: Charges framed u/s 323/376/511/354 IPC, R/W Sec. 8 POCSO Act

Accused is absent. Cause shown by the Ld. counsel vide Pt. No. 760/2019 which is allowed. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. No witnesses present. Issue fresh summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.
Accused is present. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. No witnesses present. Issue fresh summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.

Accused is present. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Two witnesses have appeared. They are examined, cross examine and discharged. Issue fresh summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.                      Fix 04.09.2019 for evidence.

Accused is present. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Two witnesses have appeared. They are examined, cross examine and discharged. Heard the Ld. PP. Evidence of prosecution side is closed. Case is listed for recording statement of the accused and defence.                     Seen the Pt. No. 1232/2019 filed by the complainant stating that she had settle the dispute amicably with the accused and prayed for passing necessary order.                       Fix 23.09.2019 for recording statement of the accused and defence and argument.

Accused is absent. Cause shown by the Ld. Defence counsel vide Pt. No. 1464/2019 which is allowed. The case was posted for recording statement of the accused and defence.                       Fix 05.11.2019 for recording statement of the accused and defence and argument.

Accused is present. The case was posted for recording statement of the accused and defence. Statement of the accused is not recorded as the questionary is not ready.                      Fix 10.12.2019 for recording statement of the accused and defence and argument.

The case was posted for recording statement of the accused and defence. Accused person is absent. Cause shown by the Ld. Counsel vide Pt. No. 1903/2019 which is allowed.                      Fix 03.01.2020 for recording statement of the accused and defence and argument.

The case was posted for recording statement of the accused and defence. Accused person is present. Statement of the accused is not recorded as the Court is busy with other cases.                      Fix 17.02.2020 for recording statement of the accused and defence and argument.

Case record put up before me as the PO is on leave. The case was posted for recording statement of the accused and defence. Accused person is present.                       Fix 06.04.2020 for recording statement of the accused and defence and argument.
